The spacious and comfortable floor plans will allow different interior designing ideas to be implemented and lift up the space with ample amount of sunlight and fresh air. It will be a perfect place to call home.
Sur La Mer townhouses will also be a great place to invest for investors looking to buy a property with a predicted ROI of 7% minimum and great capital appreciation due to it’s unique location and connectivity."]

["DescriptionExclusively for sale with LuxuryProperty.com, this beautiful 3 bedroom apartment has full sea views and is available as a vacant property. Located on a high floor in Al Nabat, this is the perfect home for anyone who wishes to live by the sea. The apartment can also be purchased in a fully furnished condition.
• 3 bedrooms
• Type A
• Size 2155 sqft
• Sea Views
• Fully fitted kitchen with appliances
• Large open plan living and dining room
• Master bedroom with en-suite bathroom
• Maid's room
• Balcony
• Vacant
As you enter the apartment, the hallway leads to a large open plan living and dining room. A fully fitted kitchen with appliances is situated on the right side with the maid's room located behind this area. The master bedroom is on the left side of the apartment with a walk-in wardrobe and en-suite bathroom, while the second and third bedrooms occupy the other side. The spacious balcony is a great place to relax, enjoy the warm weather and marvel at the stunning views.
Excellent facilities and amenities including a large swimming pool, gymnasium, basement parking, concierge and 24/7 security are all present at the Shoreline Apartments.
The Shoreline Apartments are a group of 20 mid-rise residential buildings developed by Nakheel on the trunk of Palm Jumeirah. Half of the Shoreline buildings are located on the beach and many of these apartments have views of the ocean and direct beachfront access (these are the right-hand side buildings). The left-hand side Shoreline buildings have views of Al Ittihad Park."]

descriptions:
["DescriptionKnight Frank is pleased to offer you this stunning Palm Jumeirah beach front home to the market. The owner has modified this townhouse by opening up the kitchen area as well as having redone the walls and ceilings. 
The property also comes tastefully furnished which has been selected by an Interior designer, which includes Ethan Allen furniture throughout.
Property Highlights 
Type B unit
5 Bedrooms all en-suite villa
Living and dining areas with direct access to the garden & Beach
Maid's room, stylish bathrooms, built-in wardrobes and walk-in closet
Size: 3,300 BUA Sq.ft / 3,650 Sq.ft Plot
Stunning Dubai Views
Landscaped garden with built in barbecue
Surround Sound System in the villa and garden
Over 1.2m AED Spent on upgrades and furniture
The villa is the epitome of beachfront living with landscaped gardens opening up the beach and sea with incredible Dubai views. It has been priced very competitively considering the villa condition, location and the current availability.
Please call to arrange a private viewing."]
